title: Vespa GTS Super 300 2024 Model
description: The 2024 Vespa GTS Super 300 combines style and power with a 278cc engine and modern features. Ideal for city commutes and long rides, this scooter offers both performance and elegance.
key_features: LED headlamp and daytime running lights
meta_title: Vespa GTS Super 300 2024 Model - Stylish and Powerful Scooter
meta_description: Discover the 2024 Vespa GTS Super 300, featuring a 278cc engine, advanced ABS braking system, and modern design. Perfect for city commutes and long rides. Special offer available now!

title: Vespa GTS Super 300 2023 Sport Edition
description: The 2023 Vespa GTS Super 300 Sport Edition offers a sporty design with enhanced features. Equipped with a powerful 278cc engine and advanced technology, it's perfect for those seeking a high-performance ride.

title: Vespa GTS Super 300 2022 Standard Model

title: Vespa GTS Super 300 2024 Touring Edition
description: The 2024 Vespa GTS Super 300 Touring Edition is designed for long rides with premium features. It includes a 278cc engine, advanced comfort features, and exclusive touring accessories.
